document.discussion_title: Bridgewater Canal group holds get together
document.topic_text: Bridgewater Canal group holds get together Bridgewater Canal 0 comments THE Friends of the Bridgewater Canal (Sale) will be holding their spring open meeting at 7.30pm on Tuesday, May 3 in the Moorfield Hotel, 131 Marsland Road, Sale, M33 3NW. The main speaker will be Keith Warrender, author of 'Underground Manchester' and several other books about the Manchester area. All welcome. Share:
